scripts.dev: npm run link:packages && npm run copy:assets && webpack serve
scripts.link:packages: npm link ../../atomic-react && cd ../../atomic-react && npm run link:packages
scripts.copy:assets: ncp ../../atomic-react/dist/assets public/assets && ncp ../../atomic-react/dist/lang public/lang public/assets && ncp ../../atomic/dist/atomic/themes public/themes
